Armed with a slow burn gradual buildup, nowhere does the film digresses from the topic at hand. However, the climax feels relatively sudden and convenient. Characters involved don’t have enough substance for you to feel invested in them or their hidden motives. A better character sketch, tightly woven screenplay would have made this film far more engaging. Your desire to know the truth forms the crux of crime mysteries.Here, you want to nab the culprit but the chain of events that comprise the investigation don’t keep you on the edge of your seat.
